## ComponentsSpecBuilder.withRequestBody() method

Define a component request body.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
withRequestBody(name: string, requestBody: RequestBodyObject | ReferenceObject): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>string</code> | The name of the request body |
|  requestBody | <code>RequestBodyObject &#124; ReferenceObject</code> | Specification of the request body |

<b>Returns:</b>

`this`
